Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • Geometry

  • public abstract class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
    Every Geometry represents a body in a data-space with dimensions().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Geometry(int dimension)
      Create a new Geometry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int dimensions()
      Returns the number of dimensions of the data space of this Geometry.
      abstract Geometry encapsulate(Geometry other)
      Encapsulates this Geometry and the given Geometry by a new Geometry and returns the new Geometry.
      abstract double volume()
      Returns the volume of this Geometry.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Geometry

        public Geometry(int dimension)
        Create a new Geometry. Every Geometry must have a dimension of at least 2.
        Parameters:
        dimension - number of dimensions of the data space of this Geometry
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the number of dimensions dimension is lesser than 2.

    • Method Detail

      • dimensions

        public int dimensions()
        Returns the number of dimensions of the data space of this Geometry.
        Returns:
        number of dimensions of this Geometry

      • volume

        public abstract double volume()
        Returns the volume of this Geometry. If dimensions() is 2, the volume is the area.
        Returns:
        volume of this Geometry

      • encapsulate

        public abstract Geometry encapsulate(Geometry other)
        Encapsulates this Geometry and the given Geometry by a new Geometry and returns the new Geometry. Thus the new Geometry then contains at least this and the given Geometry. If other and this have a different number of dimensions null is returned.
        Parameters:
        other - the Geometry to be encapsulated together with this Geometry
        Returns:
        a new Geometry containing this and other or null
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the type of other is unknown
